title: Grocery market share in France 2008 to 2018
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 6 lines denoting "Systeme A", Carrefour, Leclerc, Intermarche, Casino, and Other. The y axis indicates the Share of market and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall "Systeme A", and Leclerc are gradually increasing, Carrefour, Casino, and Other are gradually decreasing, Intermarche is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
Throughout the period, "Systeme A" generally had the highest Share of market relative to others with an average of 21.47, and it reached its maximum at 2013 with a value of 22.3.
Followed by Carrefour which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 20.8 Share of market,reaching its highest point  at 2008 with a value of 22.9.
The botommost line, Casino,  has a mean of 10.57, and peaked at 2008.
